name: C300 Factory Acceptance Test
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(C300 Factory Acceptance Test:[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(C300_Implementation_Methodology)*>,Non-Standard Build Estimate)){<* Eval((1- [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(C300_Exp_Labor_Uni_qntCG)*>,0)){1}{0}[ENDIF]*0.1)* 0.1 * (0<*VALUE(Labor_parametre_sys)*>* 40*0.5 + 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_mar)*>* (40 + 0<*VALUE(C300_Labor_parameter_is)*>*10)) + (0.97*(0<*VALUE(43578_Parameter_base)*>+ 0.66 * 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_Ctr)*>+ (4 * 0<*VALUE(Total_Number_of_New_Typicals (0-500))*>+ 0.029 *0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_io)*>*0<*VALUE(Labor_Percentage_FAT)*>/100) * 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_pT)*>+15*0.11)) +0<*VALUE(Labor_Parameter_bat)*>*0<*VALUE(43578_Beat)*>) *>}{<* Eval((1- [IF]([GT](<*VALUE(C300_Exp_Labor_Uni_qntCG)*>,0)){1}{0}[ENDIF]*0.1)* 0.1 * (0<*VALUE(Labor_parametre_sys)*>* 40*0.5 + 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_mar)*>* (40 + 0<*VALUE(C300_Labor_parameter_is)*>*10)) + (0.97*(0<*VALUE(43578_Parameter_base)*>+ 0.66 * 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_Ctr)*>+ (4 * 0<*VALUE(Total_Number_of_New_Typicals (0-500))*>+ 0.029 *0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_io)*>*0<*VALUE(Labor_Percentage_FAT)*>/100) * 0<*VALUE(Labor_parameter_pT)*>+15*0.11))*0.97 +0<*VALUE(Labor_Parameter_bat)*>*0<*VALUE(43578_Beat)*>) *>}[ENDIF])*>
description:
CXCPQ-43578

If im = Non-Standard Build then 
Calculated Hours = 0.1 * (sys * 20 + mar * (40 + is*10)) + (base + 0.66 * Ctr + (4 * nty + 0.029 *io*fat /100) * pT) +bat*BFAT
Else
Calculated Hours = 0.1 * (sys * 20 + mar * (40 + is*10)) + (base + 0.66 * Ctr + (4 * nty + 0.029 *io*fat /100) * pT)*0.97+bat*BFAT

BFAT = (fat/100)((bmu+bru)(F*5 + 26.212*bcscm + 6.4) + (bmr+bpr){*}(4.66*5 + 11.55*bco + 8.9))
if pT="Batch-Pharma" then F=9.412 else F = 6.052

 if io<= 400, Base = 16
      io > 400 and <=2000, Base = 32
      io  >2000 and <= 5000, Base = 64
      io > 5000, Base = 128
